# hasProtectedContent

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset contains protected content.

## Declaration

```swift
static var hasProtectedContent: AVAsyncProperty<Root, Bool> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

Assets that contain protected content may not be playable without successful authorization, even if the value of its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/isPlayable] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
title: hasProtectedContent
